question: Will Trump say "Jew" during the debate?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump says "Jew" at any point during the first in-person presidential debate in the 2024 election cycle. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No". If no in-person debate happens before election day, this market will resolve to "No".

Any usage of the word regardless of context will count toward the resolution of this market. 

Pluralization/possessive of the word will count toward the resolution of this market, however other forms (such as "Jewish") will NOT count. 

Compound words will count as long as "Jew" is part of the compound word and references the meaning which refers to the religion (e.g. "Jew-lover" counts).

The resolution source is live video of the debate. In case of ambiguity, an official transcript and/or a consensus of credible reporting may also be considered.

events.title: What will Trump say during the debate?

question: Ryan Garcia comes out of retirement before August?
description:
On June 19, Ryan Garcia tweeted "I’m officially retired" (see: https://x.com/ryangarcia/status/1803575601380598240?s=46). 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Ryan Garcia comes out of retirement by 11:59 PM ET on July 31, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Garcia will be considered to have come out of retirement if he announces that he is no longer retired from boxing, or if he is officially scheduled for a professional boxing match. Any subsequent retirement after he comes out of retirement or schedules a fight will not affect the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source will be official information from Ryan Garcia or one of his representatives; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

events.title: Ryan Garcia comes out of retirement before August?

question: Alan Keating VPIP above 85%? - Celebrity poker game
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Alan Keating has a VPIP above 85% during the Hustler Casino celebrity game scheduled for Saturday, June 22, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Only hands played during the live streamed game and counted in the final ‘VPIP’ tracker will count towards this market’s resolution.

If Keating does not participate in the Hustler Casino celebrity game scheduled for Saturday, June 22, or the game does not take place on June 22, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be the final VPIP tracker displayed at the end of the live stream. If the live stream becomes unavailable, this market will resolve according to official information from Hustler Casino Live.

Note: ‘VPIP’ refers to the percentage of hands in which a player voluntarily contributes money to the pot, and does not include the blinds.

events.title: Alan Keating VPIP above 85%? - Celebrity poker game

question: Trump family comments on $DJT by Sunday?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Donald Trump or a member of his immediate family (including any of his children or current wife Melania), make a public statement which references the Solana coin $DJT by June 23, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise this market will resolve to "No". 

Public statements include any public communications made directly by Donald Trump or members of his immediate family, as well as any other official communications from them. 

Note: Unofficial statements made by acquaintances of the Trump Family (such as a friend of Barron Trump) will not qualify for a "Yes" resolution.

The resolution source for this market will be public statements directly from Donald Trump or his immediate family, or official communications on behalf of Donald Trump.

events.title: Trump family comments on $DJT by Sunday?

question: Dan Bilzerian biggest loser?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Dan Bilzerian is the player with the highest net losses during the Hustler Casino celebrity game scheduled for Saturday, June 22, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Dan Bilzerian does not participate in the Hustler Casino celebrity game’ this market will resolve to "No".

In the event of a tie for the greatest net losses, this market will resolve in favor of the player whose listed first name comes first alphabetically.

The net losses, and the resolution of this market, will be determined based on the final ‘Cumulative Winnings’ tracker displayed at the end of the live-streamed event. Only hands played during the live-streamed game will count towards this market’s resolution. If the live stream becomes unavailable, this market will resolve according to official information from Hustler Casino Live.

question: Faithless elector in US election?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if any appointed elector in the 2024 U.S. Presidential Election votes for someone other than the candidate they pledged to support. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will the election be called on Nov 5?
description:
This market will resolve to yes if the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC have all called the U.S. Presidential election by November 5, 2024, 11:59 PM PT. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is the Associated Press, Fox News, and NBC.
